lead_paragraph: Olympic skeleton champion Lizzy Yarnold says she may boycott  next year's world championships in the Russian resort of Sochi because she believes her sport is "not clean".

headline.print_headline: Olympic Champion Yarnold May Boycott Sochi World Championships
headline.main: Olympic Champion Yarnold May Boycott Sochi World Championships
